subject: College Athletics
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Purdue’s Robbie Hummel will miss the rest of the season after tearing the anterior cruciate ligament in his right knee, jeopardizing the No. 3 Boilermakers’ Final Four hopes.
snippet: Purdue’s Robbie Hummel will miss the rest of the season after tearing the anterior cruciate ligament in his right knee, jeopardizing the No. 3 Boilermakers’ Final Four hopes.
